column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As for the pizza
column2: obviously you gotta go for the butter crust upgrade.  We ordered a large plain cheese
column3: and a large deluxe (I think that's what it was called).  Normally
column5: but not this one.  Fantastic sauce and really good cheese.  I'm not sure if they use a blend of cheeses here or what
column7: and was surprisingly not heavy or oily.  Despite being a butter crust
column9: this was one of the lighter tasting pizzas I've ever eaten.
